Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Prepaid and Other Current Assets: prepaid expense and other assets current
prepaid expenses and other current assets
Receivables: accounts notes and loans receivable net current

Deferred Tax Assets: deferred tax assets liabilities net current

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss available for sale securities adjustment net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss cumulative changes in net gain loss from cash flow hedges effect net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss foreign currency translation adjustment net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax
aoci loss cash flow hedge cumulative gain loss after tax
Common Stock and APIC: additional paid in capital common stock

__unmapped__: assets of disposal group including discontinued operation current
common stock par or stated value per share
long term debt and capital lease obligations
preferred stock par or stated value per share
property plant and equipment and finance lease right of use asset after accumulated depreciation and amortization
